name: The Magic of Winter ~ Visual Novel
name_original: The Magic of Winter ~ Visual Novel
description:
Link and Zelda have been friends for a long time but what happens when Zelda sees a vision of what's to come? How will she react? One thing is for sure, it's that there's the magic of winter everywhere.

There are sadly no character sprites due to my lack of a budget and because of copyright. 

Please note, this is still a work in progress. Images and sounds are not final. Story is complete though. Feedback is appreciated, this is my first game!

This Visual Novel is based off of my fanfics! For more fanfics like this one please check out my fanfic site : https://jmacsfanfictions.wordpress.com/

Enjoy the read!
